ack.title: Contributors
ack.p: SSM and PD selected the topics for review, wrote portions of the paper, and coordinated and edited the contributions of all other authors. SSM did the searches of scientific literature, with contributions from the other authors. CZ-T analysed the underlying data and produced the hotspot map; all other authors contributed sections of the Series paper, provided references, and contributed to revisions. All authors reviewed the paper.
